item.title: Crochet Along Together #1: Easy as 1-2-3 Cowl (Part 1)
item.description: The fine folks at Skacel Knitting are hosting a series they call “Crochet Along Together” or “CAT” for short. They post videos throughout the month to walk you through the project. A draw is also held after the project is finished. March CAT This is their very first installment and is geared towards (but not limited to) beginners to crochet. The project for this months is the Easy As 1-2-3 Cowl which is a three colour cowl.
